items.text: To pay immediately for a cash purchase
Cash flow tied up in a depreciating asset
If the asset no longer suits you, you're stuck

solution.title: Lease to finance better
solution.description: Leasing allows you to use an asset without buying it immediately. The asset remains collateral, so we can offer better rates. At the end, you can buy it or return it.

features.title: Advantageous rates
features.description: The asset guarantees the loan. Less risk for us = better rate for you.

features.title: No immediate purchase
features.description: Keep your cash flow. No large outlay at the start.

features.title: Controlled payments
features.description: A fixed amount each month, easy to budget.

features.title: Purchase option
features.description: At the end of the contract, buy the asset at residual value or return it.

features.title: Flexibility
features.description: Asset no longer suits you? At the end of the contract, you're not obliged to buy.

features.title: Vehicles and equipment
features.description: Car, utility, professional equipment, IT. Everything can be leased.

features.title: Tax advantages (business)
features.description: For professionals, deductible lease payments. Tax optimization.

features.title: 100% online
features.description: From simulation to signature, everything is done remotely.

profiles.title: Personal vehicle
profiles.description: Car, motorcycle, scooter. Drive without emptying your savings.

profiles.title: Professional vehicle
profiles.description: Utility, fleet, company car. Deductible and controlled.

profiles.title: Professional equipment
profiles.description: Machines, tools, heavy equipment. Invest without blocking.

profiles.title: IT equipment
profiles.description: Servers, workstations, infrastructure. Renew without extra cost.

steps.title: Choose the asset
steps.description: Vehicle, equipment, material. We estimate its value and your leasing.

steps.title: Validation
steps.description: Analysis of your file and the asset. Response within 48h.

steps.title: Use it
steps.description: Contract signed, you use the asset. At the end, purchase or return.
